Uses of Class
org.dspace.browse.BrowserScope

Packages that use BrowserScope
org.dspace.app.webui.servlet   
org.dspace.browse Provides classes and mehtods for browsing Items in DSpace by whatever is specified in the configuration. 
 

Uses of BrowserScope in org.dspace.app.webui.servlet
 

Methods in org.dspace.app.webui.servlet that return BrowserScope
protected  BrowserScope AbstractBrowserServlet.getBrowserScopeForRequest(Context context, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
          Create a BrowserScope from the current request
 

Methods in org.dspace.app.webui.servlet with parameters of type BrowserScope
protected  void BrowserServlet.exportMetadata(Context context, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response, BrowserScope scope)
          Export the metadata from a browse
protected  void AbstractBrowserServlet.processBrowse(Context context, BrowserScope scope, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
          Do the usual DSpace GET method.
 

Uses of BrowserScope in org.dspace.browse
 

Methods in org.dspace.browse with parameters of type BrowserScope
 BrowseInfo BrowseEngine.browse(BrowserScope bs)
          Perform a standard browse, which will return a BrowseInfo object that represents the results for the current page, the total number of results, the range, and information to construct previous and next links on any web page
 BrowseInfo BrowseEngine.browseMini(BrowserScope bs)
          Perform a limited browse, which only returns the results requested, without any extraneous information.
